Project abstract:
Project abstract:
CCR8 agonist compounds will be tested for potency in vitro in cell lines and for function on human T cells. Compounds with highest potency will be
tested in a humanized in vivo model xenogeneic graft-vs-host disease for efficacy in expansion of regulatory T cells and disease amelioration.
Last modified: 
Last modified: 
31-05-2024
